Title: Relates to reporting on the metropolitan transportation authority's state of good repair
Summary: Relates to reporting on the metropolitan transportation authority's state of good repair; requires the reporting to be published on the authority's website, outlining the repairs and investments needed to restore the authority's existing transit systems to a state of good repair.
LawCode: Amd ยง1269-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to reporting on the metropolitan transportation authority's state of good repair
